Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

A general RESTART of the rpg has been 
suggested, and there has been a 
favourable reacion. This is the vote 
for whether you think that we should 
go through with it. 

NOTE: Do NOT simply vote No because it 
wouldn't benifit you, or because you 
wouldn't like it. Likewise of voting 
Yes.

Do you think that restarting the rpg 
should happen? 

  o Yes. 
  o No. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
